channel.title: Git on Mudox
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Mudox

item.title: Git Objects
item.description: Git Object Database A git repository is essentially a key-value database, where the value is a git object and the key is a SHA-1 value which is is assigned to each value when firstly added into the database. 4 Kinds Of Git Objects TL;DR A tree (like directories in file systems) as a directory save metadata and address (the SHA-1 keys) to contained blob objects as well as sub-trees. A
